forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Boston, the city rests comfortably under a blanket of tranquility, the air cool and crisp at a refreshing 55 degrees. The night’s remnants linger in the form of gentle, lapping clouds that offer a hint of mystery, yet promise clarity as the sun prepares to rise higher. Today’s forecast whispers of a day both gentle and warm, with the sun breaking through to reveal a vibrant blue sky as temperatures rise to a pleasant 76. As the afternoon unfurls, a subtle cooling will set in, ushering the warmth to a moderate 68, inviting a soft breeze that speaks of springtime's embrace.

Venturing into this day, it would be wise to dress in layers, perhaps donning a lightweight jacket that can be shed as the sun warms the skin. An effortless stroll through the cobblestone streets of Beacon Hill or a relaxed afternoon at the Public Garden could paint a perfect picture of this sun-kissed day. Whether one chooses to sip coffee on a park bench, losing track of time while reading a book, or meandering through the city’s art-filled corners, today offers a serene canvas for leisurely pursuits, spilling over with all the charm that Boston exudes this time of year.
